tool_description: An API showing weather news around the globe
name: Clima
title: Clima

api_list.name: Get one source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://clima65.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "clima65.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://clima65.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "clima65.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
